metadata.description: When Zak Tyler finds a powerful, yet, kid-sized Alien Supersuit controlled by A.I. Technology in his closet, his first notion is to live out his fantasy of being a SUPERHERO! But, when a dark alien overlord aptly named Lord Dreadnite comes looking for his stolen technology, Zak learns just what it takes to be a real hero as he fights for the survival of his family - and the entire earth!
metadata.name: Kozmik
